title: Minor question: Dynamic Profile Background
body:
For the last month or two, my profile background had been displaying my highest mastery champion (Gnar, in this case), but it recently seemed to switch back to "Most played champion from the last 20 games."

I'd prefer it to go back to the highest mastery, so is there a way I can manually change this? I did take a bit of a break from Gnar after hitting mastery 7 (Long story short, being frustrated by an inability to get an S kind of kills my enjoyment of the game), is this why it changed in the first place?

replies.body: Currently, the background is set to most recently played and not mastery.  It's a solid idea, though, and makes sense to me!  Be sure to share your feedback on the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  The updated client is still in testing, so it can help a lot.  Thanks!
I know this was about a month ago but my most recently played is karthus and i have my most points with him AND have played 11 games out of 20 with him, please help ! :D

I'm pretty certain it was displaying the highest mastery for a good few months already though. Like I said, I had taken a break from Gnar for a while after hitting rank 7, and it would still display Gnar on my profile.
